Name: Simon
description:
Simon is a 37-year-old resident of Lukerere, a town on the outskirts of Kyotera district. He is married with four daughters and two sons. Simon's children all attend school. He is a banana farmer and he struggles to make ends meet due to high inflation, unfavorable weather patterns, soil infertility and other issues. Simon is a resourceful person and he compliments his banana production with a small local boutique and goat trade to pay his children's school fees even in such trying times.

Simon is requesting a loan to buy manure to improve soil fertility to increase his banana crop. He hopes his loan will give him a rich harvest so he can sell bananas at profitable prices.
